resources.string: Search for a buzzword in the news
Feel free to contact us at buzzwordsapp@gmail.com
A word commonly found in contemporary sources.

Buzzwords aims to extract the main keywords in the media. It scans a variety of financial, scientific, or political news sources for the most frequent terminology. Then, it complies these words into a regularly updated interface where users can quickly and easily view their definitions.

Buzzwords was created in early 2023 by Alex Chen, Shivani Parmar, and Thomas Park, each of Massachusetts Academy of Math and Science. This project was under the Apps For Good Project, under supervision from Mrs. Angela Taricco.
This is Buzzy! They\'re the app\'s mascot. They are inspired from the word \"buzzsaw\", a circular saw. Thus, they have 8 spikes to show they\'re tough enough to handle the news!
